def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    ans_min = 1
    ans_max = 1
    for i in range(1, n):
        if x[i] != x[i - 1]:
            ans_min += 1
    if x[0] != 1:
        ans_max += 1
    if x[-1] != n:
        ans_max += 1
    print(ans_min, ans_max)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    min_ans = 1
    max_ans = 1
    for i in range(1, n):
        if x[i] != x[i - 1]:
            min_ans += 1
    if x[0] != 1:
        max_ans += 1
    if x[-1] != n:
        max_ans += 1
    print(min_ans, max_ans)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

#print(n, x)

min_cnt = 0
max_cnt = 0

# min
curr = x[0]
min_cnt = 1
for i in range(1, len(x)):
    if x[i] != curr:
        curr = x[i]
        min_cnt += 1

# max
curr = x[0]
max_cnt = 1
for i in range(1, len(x)):
    if x[i] != curr:
        curr = x[i]
        max_cnt += 1
    elif x[i] == curr and i == len(x)-1:
        max_cnt += 1

print(min_cnt, max_cnt)
